aboutTitle: A fusion of poetic and aggressive sound
bandDescription:
Knot Poet was born from the fusion of dreamlike sounds and metal atmospheres.
Each song is a journey into the subconscious, guided by evocative lyrics and powerful arrangements.

mitch.description: Frontman, songwriter, and rhythm guitarist: a poet with a megaphone!
mitch.longDescription:
From early days in preschool choir to tormenting neighbors with his high notes, Mitch has always been possessed by music. At 15, he joined a few local bands and began training in secret, plotting sonic revenge from his bedroom.

At 21, he finally started taking singing and guitar lessons — much to the dismay of his teachers, who eventually encouraged him to pursue his destructive solo path. In 2023, he met Francio and Echoes, bonding over a shared love of metal: power and thrash with Francio, more eclectic vibes with Echoes.

Thus Knot Poet was born, with Mitch at the helm, ready to shatter eardrums across the globe. His motto? "Keep the metal ALIVEEEEEEE!!"

francio.description: Guitarist and band founder, listens to records only he and the producers know about
francio.longDescription:
While others watched cartoons, Francio was analyzing guitar solos and hunting down obscure vinyl. A true sound archaeologist, he founded Knot Poet with a vision: to blend poetic atmospheres with face-melting riffs.

Known for his encyclopedic knowledge of underground metal, Francio brings power, precision, and a headbanging rhythm section that shakes walls. When he’s not playing, he’s probably digging through old forums looking for forgotten demos.

He doesn't talk much—his riffs say it all.

ingo.description: Guitarist descended from the Swiss Alps. His calm hides a Black Metal past
ingo.longDescription:
Raised in the silence of the mountains, Ingo's calm hides a turbulent past in the underground black metal scene. He traded frozen forests for smoke-filled rehearsal rooms—but kept the darkness in his sound.

When he joined the Knot Poet crew, he brought eerie melodies, glacial tremolo picking, and a supernatural ability to summon storms with a single chord.

He rarely smiles—but when he does, it’s usually after a flawlessly executed blast beat.

echoes.description: Progressive bassist. Playing bass made him bald
echoes.longDescription:
Echoes didn’t choose the bassist life—the bassist life chose him. With fingers faster than light and a groove that can realign planets, he adds a cosmic touch to the heavy foundation of Knot Poet.

Influenced by prog, funk, and jazz, Echoes blends styles with elegance and aggression. Legend has it that each of his slaps resonates across dimensions.

And yes, baldness is a badge of dedication: each lost hair, a groove gained.

fede.description: Fede, everyone’s drummer: speaks little, hits hard. Yes, he even wears the bandana in bed
fede.longDescription:
Fede emerged from the chaos of cymbals and toms with a single mission: to keep everyone moving. Known for his relentless energy and his mythical bandana, he’s the heartbeat of the band.

He doesn’t waste time with words: his double kicks say it all. Whether in the studio or on stage, Fede unleashes pure percussive power with surgical precision.
